title: League Update issue
body: So I haven't played in a while and I booted up league to update to which I got this error constantly when trying to do it. I don't know why this is happening and I've tried to uninstall and install again just to get the same error. I would like some help on this please. Thanks!

replies.body:
Issues during patching can be caused by a number of different factors. This could be the result of missing system permissions or networking problems, so there are a number of steps that can be taken. We've consolidated the most common solutions in our [Patching Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues), so I recommend starting there.

Let me know if those steps resolved this.

Can you tell me why my game crashes after champ select now? It wouldn't do that before this patch. I've used Riot's troubleshooting guide and searched on google for a fix. Nothing has worked. I uninstalled league, restarted my computer, installed league and it still crashes after champ select. Can you help me with this? I can't get an answer from any Riot employee please help >.>
